description: JavaScript String class extending built-in String class
name: @wf-team/string

scripts.deploy: npm i add-dependencies -g && npm i npm-check-updates -g
scripts.fix-start: ncu -u -n "/^@wf-team.*$/" && npm --no-git-tag-version version pre%fix-type% && npm publish
scripts.fix: ncu -u -n "/^@wf-team.*$/" && npm --no-git-tag-version version prerelease && npm publish
